title: Port original Bottok provider into providers/indirect.js
body: Port and adapt the original `bottok.js` provider logic (Puppeteer/captcha/cloudflare handling) into `providers/indirect.js`. Ensure licensing and attribution are correct, add tests, and keep a `dryRun` fallback.

title: Playwright stealth â€” fingerprint rotation & fingerprint-suite
body: Integrate fingerprint rotation and optional `playwright-extra` compatibility layer. Add `--fingerprint` CLI flag, build rotation schedules, and add CI tests to validate variability.

title: Proxy health-check + external provider hooks
body: Implement proxy health checks, integration with external proxy providers (APIs), runtime metrics and CLI options to set rotator strategy.

title: Captcha solver plugins (Tesseract + external)
body: Add plugin interface for external captcha solvers and optional cloud connector; add retry/backoff and a test harness for captcha resolution.

title: LangGraph full integration + example flows
body: Expand the LangGraph agent to run multi-step flows, include example flows in `examples/`, and add integration tests that run against a local Ollama instance.

title: CI matrix for Ollama integration
body: Add optional CI job(s) to run Ollama integration tests when a secret `OLLAMA_URL` is provided. Ensure tests are gated and won't run otherwise.

title: Docs: runtime stealth presets & per-shim toggles
body: Expand README with best-practices and security advice for `--stealth` and `--stealth-disable` usage; add examples and recommended presets.
